The strange tongues which had whispered within your ears also slowly vanish, replaced by utter silence. The serene enviroment gradually sooths away the edge from your death.

However the path soon begins to twist and bend before you, a growing sense of dread once more surfaces. The rubies shine with the luster of blood as you break into a dash, striving to get anywhere, anything would be better than this horrible path. 121111.content:
While it seems composed of pure malice, the portal uncontrollably draws you nearer. In a momentary lapse of logic you step into it's folds. An instant later you realize the folly of this and pull back, but it is far too late; the portal pulls you into itself with the force of a hurricane. For many minutes you can make out nothing but darkness, are you to wander in it forever? These thoughts are chased away as a soft golden light appears over the horizon, with all your effort you dash towards it. The light gradually fades away, and you fear that you have missed your only chance for salvation. However once again the pull of the portal yanks you downward.

When the fog within your mind clears you find yourself in a large chamber, adorned with golden statues. A soft clapping fills the air as a tall woman descends from the rooms twin staircase. She is clothed from head to toe in white, yet a strange shadow seems to cover her face at all times, despite your efforts you can never get a good look at her. After what seems an eternity she reachs the floor and breaks the silence.

"You've done well to make it here, I was honestly unsure as to wether you would roam in the shadows for the rest of time."

You attempt to speak but the woman raises a single finger, silencing you.

"There is no need to tell me, I know whom you are. You found yourself within the tower of the Teen Titans. Gradually your size began to change... and you were mashed beneath a mere boot. I witnessed it all. It has been about three months since this occured, time is very fluid within these realms, and your body has already been found. You see the tower was taken over once more by a team of students from the H.I.V.E. Your battered body was examined by the one known as Gizmo, and he derived from it the responsible chemical."

At this point you interupt, simply wanting an answer as to why this is all happening.

"But how did I get into the tower?! This world isin't even real!"

While her face remains hidden you can innatly sense that the woman is quite frustrated with you.

"That is not necisarry as of now. There is much work to be done, and once complete I will inform you of the real details. The H.I.V.E. students have used the chemical to shrink the majority of the city's population. The entire area is at their mercy, and Gizmo aspires to increase their power even further. As only he knows the full process required to shrink a human he has become their de facto leader, and is your primary target."

It is obvious that both of you have begun to resent the other, yet you remain silent in fear of angering her further; she is obviously more than human.

"My power within the mortal planes is limited, and I cannot stop the H.I.V.E. myself. However the Titans have escaped the students chemical. There are two possible ways to go about the matter. I could return you to Earth in your original form, albeit shrunken, and you would attempt to rally the heroes against them. The other option is to inhabit the last living creature you touched. I believe it was "Beast Boy". His soul would be stored within this space and you would be placed within his body. You would retain both of your collective memories, allowing you to blend in among the Titans. Alternativly you can tell them of your true nature, I care not for your methods."

While her words strike you as bleak you are thrilled at the possibility of living once more.

"If I possess beastboy, what happens when the battles are over? Do I stay dead?"

The woman slowly shakes her head, pointing to an orb upon one of the rooms many statues.

"Beast Boy's soul will be sealed here. When your mission is complete you will recieve the choice. Either keep his body and identity, and he will inherit yours, or return to your original life. Such affairs are trivial in a cosmic sense, mortal identities are fleeting. Now, it is time to decide what guise to assume."

13411.content:
"What? No! Please, just help me change back!" You pleaded to the young hero, who tilts his head to the side to regard you carefully, and starts to smile.
You have a bad feeling that he isn't joking about keeping you, and as a tiny person, you have no chance of escaping the clutches of a guy with super-powers.
Begging and pleading seem to be leading you nowhere, so you whimper up at him, trembling in his grip.
He stops smiling and frowns sadly, feeling guilty that you look so scared.
"No no, it's okay! Don't cry, little dude! I'll take good care of you, I promise!" He looks around, then kneels by some of the messier piles in his room to start rummaging around with his free hand, until he lets out a triumphant cry and pulls out a terrarium. He empties out the junk that was in it to set it on top of his bed. Beastboy sets you down next to it, and wags a finger at you.
"Now don't go anywhere!" He's smiling again, and seems to think he's on the way to resolving your problem with his decision.
He starts to go around the room, picking up clothes and piling them in his arms. You look at the terrarium, and feel your stomach clench as you realize that this is where he intends to keep you. Soon, Beastboy is back, holding about seven articles of clothing, which he begins to carefully pile in the glass case, before gently picking you up and setting you inside.
"See? Isn't that comfy?" Weirdly, it is kind of comfortable in there. His clothes make a nice bed/landscape, and the lingering scent of him on his own clothes is kind of musky, but pleasant. And he looks so pleased looking down at you that you can't help but smile a little back at him.
"Great! Now I gotta go get some stuff and think up a good excuse for why you're here, in case anyone finds you. Stay in there and be a good pet, okay?" You realize that he's really going to do this, and start to protest again, but are interrupted by the sly smile on his face.
"And when I get baaaaack, we'll discuss the terms of our relationship." He adds, waggling his eyebrows suggestively, and then dashes off.
...What did he mean by that?
You have little choice but to sit in the terrarium and wait for him to return.
After a little while,you hear someone approach.

You constantly run your fingers through each section of her foot and gently squeeze in some kind of rhythmic pattern. Judging by your pink-haired mistress's moaning with satisfaction, so far so good. It was a little difficult trying to keep your balance on her heel while trying to rub the space under her big toe. But it was an even bigger pain climbing all the way to the top of her foot just to rub each space in between her toes.

And after a long hard time of working your ass off for your mistress, reality hits you. You got to do the OTHER foot next! Fun.
FINALLY after working your ass off AGAIN, your entire body is sore and aching, but you finally finished the other foot. Whew! At least it's over... you hope.

"Mmm! That was good!" Jinx complimented you, "I knew it'd be a good idea having you as a slave, little boy. Just a shame youre not a couple feet taller... imagine the possibilities!"
"...Id rather not."
"What was that?"
"UH! umm..." you humbly bow down to her, "I said thank you, Mistress Jinx. It was a pleasure!"

This night's been going on too long. She's gotta sleep sometime. Her feet were killing her after that little stealthy intrusion into the Titan Tower... surely the rest of her must be just as tired! You gotta contact Raven, but it'll be impossible with your 'mistress' watching you like the snake that she is.

Question is, is she feeling tired?
143211221222122.title: ...Oh right... she has TWO feet.

choices: you sucessfully contact Raven and she resscues you
White Reaper keeping you from contacting Raven, he enjoys that your Jinx's slave
1432112212221221.content:
Jinx yawned, She was starting to get a little drowsy.

"You did a REAL good job relaxing me little boy. I'll take a nap. But first..."

She reached down, garbbed you, put you in a jar and set it on her nightstand.

"Good night little boy." Jinx said then got in her bed and feel asleep. Good, good, now to contact Raven. You get in that meditation sitting position. What were those words Raven always says? Ah, you remember.

"Azarath...Metrion...Zinthos." you mummer

All you can focouse on is Raven or this woun't work, you keep reapeating the chant over and over. Wishing with all your heart, mind, body and soul that you get it right.
1432112212221221.title: Jinx is starting to get a little drowsy...YES!!!!!

14321122122212212.content:
"Azarath...Metrion...Zinthos.... Azarath Metrion Zinthos..... Azarath Metrion Zinthos!" the longer you chant those words, the more you get the hang of saying them. Still, youre no master sorcerer of the Dark Arts like Raven is. Perhaps your mind is still a little weak. Nonetheless, it doesnt stop you.

Not because of true power lies from within and other self-motivational bullshit. But because the last thing you'd want in this very world is to be Jinx's personal mini-slave!
Worse even, it's a school night. She'll probably have classes tomorrow morning... And by what they tend to teach, you better hope to Chronos that there's no show-and-tell in one of them!

Even if not, there's still plenty of horrible fates to imagine... human pencil-sharpener for math, gym shoe insole for P.E., punching-bag for Tai Kwan Do, science-project in biology(if not dissected!)... the possibilities are endless!

"Azeroth Metrion Zinthos! Azeroth Zinthos!" youre getting used to this! Your clearing your mind of doubt and focusing.... focusing on getting a hold of Raven, "Azeroth Metrion Zinthos!" Shouldnt be too long from now....

**********4 hours later...***************

"Azeroth.....Metrion.....Zin...thos...." You've been at it for 4 hours straight and STILL nothing! Sheesh, how the hell does Raven do it?! Your legs are cramping up from sitting on them so awkwardly.
All your effort was in vain and you have nothing to show for it but aching legs! Jinx is still sleeping ever so peacefully. Only a few more hours until morning.

*Tap tap tap tap!* Just then, you heard something tap on the jar youre in. You turn your head to see who's tapping... HIM!
That arrogant red-headed sore-loser. Come to gloat?!

"REAPER!!" you bang on the jar as if to try and get out so you could strangle that brat, however he just looks back at you with a devious smile.
With a snap of his fingers, a little vision appears before you... a vision of Raven. Raven... out cold... trapped inside a big glass containment unit while a few people on the outside stare down at her probably whispering to one another. One of them catches your eye. A rather tall, very built man in a black and orange mask wearing a black suit with silver metal plating...

Raven's been captured... by one of the deadliest villains of them all! SLADE! And the White Reaper has come to rub it in your nose. So that settles it. Youre screwed!
"Oh, but look on the bright side!" White mocks you, "at least you dont get to die... although you'll probably wish you did!"

"SHUT UP, YOU DEATH-REJECT!!" you shouted as you punched the glass one last time. Unfortunately, you dont know your own strength! That was single punch caused the entire jar to shake! Not just shake. Tip!

"Oops! Uh oh-UWAAAAAAA!!!!" and fall!

*CRAAAACCCCKKKK!!!* and break! WAY to close to Jinx whose trying to rest up for class tomorrow... question is, did you interrupt her beauty sleep?
14321122122212212.title: Raven cant rescue you! Nah nah nah nah NAH-NAH!

choices: Blackfire wants you to be her boyfriend
She has something else in mind for you
143211221222122121.content:
Hearing the crash, Jinx awoke with a start and scaned the floor, her eyes zeroing in on you. The White Reaper, the only bit of eveidence that you didn't mean to do that and you wern't trying to escape, had ditched you to Jinx's non-existent mercy. You REALLY hate that death-reject. Jinx's massave hand swoops down, and suddenly your in frount of her face in a steel grip. Jinx started to tighten her hold...she was crushing you!!!

"So...trying to escape?" she hissed at you, just as you give up hope and think your finished, a purple starbolt struck Jinx and sent her through the wall and you were falling. You close your eyes, fully expecting the impact with the floor to kill you, shattering your bones and causing your body to split open like a water ballon...

WHAP!

...only to land in something warm and soft. You open your eyes, glad your not dead, to see your in the plam of whoever saved you. Your rescuer was a female Tamaranean, one with black boots, a black skirt, and black shirt with a silver body suit under it, covering her stomach, and long gauntlets that started at her elbows and went all the way to the back of her hands, not going fully around her hand so her starbolts didn't destroy the gloves, and going up the full langth of her arms and shoulders, that odd neck-collar thing that Tamaraneans had as part of they're outfits, black gems in the back of the hands of the gloves and in the center of the neck-collar thing were her neck met her torso. The girl also had black hair and blue-purple eyes. You gape at her.

BLACKFIRE?!?!?!?

Starfire's older sister saved you?! Questions erupted in your head. Blackfire was a villaness! An enemy of the Teen Titans. She'd been banished from her own homeworld for crying out loud.

What as Blackfire doing back on earth?

How had she goten into H.I.V.E?

How had she found Jinx's room?

Why did she rescue you?

Did she do it so SHE could tourtue you?

Blackfire gentally closed her hand around you and brought you to her face, a caring smile on her face. You were shaking in her grip, you were more than half expecting her to crush you or something. Blackfire brought her free hand up to your head and you wince, expecting the worst, but instead she started petting you.

"Ssshhh. Easy now, easy. Stop shaking, I woun't hurt you little guy." Blackfire cooes to you. You obey, but only becouse she scares you, you've seen what that Tamaranean super-strength can do when Starfire got in a fight, and you don't feel it'd be too far-fetched to say that you feel that a Tamaranean can give Superman a challenge in armwrestling.

Blackfire smiles at you. "Don't worry, I'm not going to hurt you. Truth be told, I spotted you the first time I was here on earth and I liked what I saw. Also, I’ve always had a dream about owning a tiny person. So this is a two-birds-with-one-stone deal." she said as she flew out of H.I.V.E after blasting a hole in the roof of Jinx's room.

What the heck is she talking about? The extraterestal teenage girl landed in front of a house and went inside and took you to a room you guess was hers, you guess this becouse there's a picture of Starfire being used as a dartbord. Blackfire set you down on the bed and then laid down on it on her stomach, her head proped up on her hands, her legs kicking slightly in the air. The way she was staring at you was starting to make you feel uncomfortable.

"You Know little guy...after I was banished from Tamaran, I was really lonely. What I needed wasn't just a home, I needed a companion." Blackfire sighed as she kept staring at you. Companion? What did she...UH-HO!!! NO WAY!!! DID SHE...?!?!?

Blackfire giggled as she poked you in the stomcah and tickled you a little bit.
143211221222122121.title: Rescued by...BLACKFIRE?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!

1432112212221221211.content:
Just when youre out of the hands of one great threat, youre in the hands of an even greater threat! This is the third time in a row you've been kidnapped. And now not only are you a long way from home... youre gonna be a long way from your home PLANET!

To be a slave to an alien villainess.. possibly in some deserted planet where NO hero exists that will save you. Why did you even bother waking up this morning?!

However, it almost seemed like Blackfire sensed your uneasiness as she stroked your hair again. "Guess you probably want to know how you ended up the way you were?"
That question caught your immediate attention! She knows how you gotten this way?You lifted your head up to look back toward her. "Y...YOU KNOW?!"

"Know?" the tamaranean giggled, "who else coulda made you so cute and adorable as you are now?"

It didnt take you long to realize what Blackfire meant by that... or panic after realizing what she's capable of! "Y...Y....Y..." you stuttered as you pointed up to her, "YOU... SHRUNK ME?!"
Judging by the smile still not leaving her face, it wasnt a no!
"I owe it all to this little baby!" Blackfire pulled out what seemed to be some kind of shard of black crystal. It glowed an eerie greyish color after staring at it for too long, "This has given me the solution to my loneliness. It brought you to me."
"W...Why?!" you questioned her, "Why did you have to do this to me?!"

Unfortunately, she was STILL smiling as she pet you, despite you brushing her hand away. "So you wouldnt escape. So you COULDNT escape. I told you that ever since I first saw you on this planet, I was interested in you." That's when you noticed her smile dropping and her petting becoming less soft and more firm, "...Didnt want any stuck-up prissy-missy goodie two-shoes so-called 'defender of justice' getting in the way of what's mine!" She glared as she stared up at the picture in her dart-board!

Wow...she stalked you because she liked you? It's not that you dont feel even the slightest bit flattered, but...
"Th-then how did I end up in the Titan To-"
"Sis and her friends sucker-punched me and took ya!" she interrupted you, "but it wasnt that difficult getting you back with the help of a little friend..."

"What friend?"

"THIS one!" a different voice came out of her mouth! A voice rather darker, sinister, and with more of an accent! ...No....
She pulled out a red haired doll wearing white with blood-red eyes. White Reaper!
"Another special trick courtesy of the crystal!" it spoke, mimicing every mouth movement Blackfire was doing like a puppet! "Defying death was quite a clever charade, wouldnt you say? Heheheheheh!" He even mimiced Blackfire tilting her head back and laughing!
So apparently she knows you well enough to realize how desperate you'll get when your life is on the line. That is scary. And you know it's about to get scarier.

"Um...Blackfire," you swallow hard and begin, "since you finally have me, what exactly do you intend to do with me?" You feared the answer, but you had to know.
However, something struck you as odd when you started to see her orange face start to turn red.
"Well... um..." she seemed to stutter, "I... I... uh... was hoping I wasnt gonna rule the galaxy alone."
"Rule the galaxy?" 'Alone'?!

The evil (in a sense) tamaranean eyed her crystal with an eerie twinkle in her purple eyes. "It's only a matter of time before I take back what's rightfully mine: the Tamaran throne! All I need to do is get rid of the current heir-"
"Your sister?"
"Only by blood," she snapped back, "Then I'll finally show the entire universe the true might of the Tamaran Empire!" Ouch. Now you REALLY wish you didnt wake up this morning!

"What do you say?" she stared deeply into your soul as she asked, "You'll get anything and everything the galaxy has to offer. Power, fame, absolute rule... if you'll rule alongside me as King and Queen."

Anything and everything?! To rule the entire universe (or at least be aside someone who will rule the entire universe!)... quite an offer, but a huge and painful one. Blackfire has evil intentions and a future with her ruling all is a very scary one.

But before you could say anything, she gives you a fair warning. "Only fair to warn you," Blackfire warns you, "When I get the throne back, Tamaran will be attacking Earth first. Dont expect to be one of the lucky earthlings that DONT get obliterated in the invasion!"
Blackfire smiled as said sweetly, "Hope you choose wisely!" then her voice changed to that of the Reaper, "Because you know what might happen if you choose poorly!"
1432112212221221211.title: Blackfire wants you to be her boyfriend

choices: You and Balckfire get married first
You and Blackfire form your Galactic Empire first
14321122122212212111.content:
You ask Blackfire for some time to think this over. She agrees to give you until tomarrow, it was a big choice, and she knew it. You and Blackfire ruling the entire universe... anything and everything the galaxy has to offer is quite an offer, but a huge and painful one. You toss and turn all night as you think it over. The obliteration of earth and Tamaran is NOT something you want on your shoulders, but...Blackfire had warned you about what would happen to you if you refused her offer. Still...are you so much of a cowerd that you'd save your own hide while your entire homeworld was destroyed? But mabey you can talk her out of it once you get into her good graces, just banish the superheros to some far-off rock on the edge of space and destroy earht IF they come back. After that, who knows what would happen, but it seems to ease your troubles about what your getting into. Blackfire was being fair to you, you thought. And if the planet's safty was used as a deturent, the guys who could stop the two of you would have they're hands tied. You knew the Goverment had been giving the Justice Leauge greif over the whole "Justice Lords" bit, and if they wanted the heros gone so badly, you could use that to rub it in they're faces to get them to see they were wrong. But if the heroes were gone, what about the villans? That was simple enough: sell em off to Apokolips to get on Darkseid's good side, then you could nail HIM too. And a Galactic Empire sounded kind of neat.

So that settled it.

The morning came and so did your time to give Blackfire your answer.

"Well Beloved?" Blackfire asked you, standing with her hands on her hips, looking for all the world like a godess. You take a deep breath, look up at her and nod with a smile. Blackfire's reaction was imedate...and if you could say so...quite painful. Her squeel of delight nearly made you go deaf and she had you in a hug that would have crushed you even if you were normal sized, you soon thought of how you hated to be on the receving end of Blackfire's Tamaranean superstrength if you turned her down.

"Blackfire...can't...brathe..." you gasp

"Huh? Ho! Sorry my darling!!!!!: Blackfire said as she let you go and she replaced the huging with petting you again. You told her about your Superhero-banishment-plan, Blackfire laughed at that, the alien villainess found destroying everyone the heros cared about if they came back and tired stoping the two of you funny. And she found your good-side-then-knife-em-in-the-back proposle a fitting way to get rid of Darkseid.

"So that only leaves one question: Marrage or empire first. I'll let you pick." you tell your new feoncie. Blackfiresat down next to you, kicking her legs happily that you were going to be hers.

Blackfire chose that...
14321122122212212111.title: You accept her proposal

143211221222122121111.content:
"Well... I've waited a long time to get the Tamaran throne... perhaps I can wait a little longer for the Galactic throne... I hope you dont mind if we get our union of marriage over with first!"

Hearing those words come out of her mouth made you sigh in relief! You want to do little arm thrusts and shout 'YES! YES! YEEEESSS!!!', but you maintain your outside composure so Blackfire wont get suspicious.
This is indeed a good thing. It doesnt officially push you out of the fire, but it does bide you some time. Perhaps maybe some time to rethink about your ideal role as King of the Galaxy. You cant help but worry about your home planet being at the mercy of supervillains and the superheroes having little to know chance of keeping peace. Not to mention the fact that others more powerful than you might wanna usurp your throne. Someone will break the truce. You just know it!

"Um, you dont mind, do you?" suddenly, her voice breaks your train of thought.You calm yourself down and shake your head non-stop, "No! Not at all! I'd be more than happy to do this!"
Judging by the warming smile on her face, that was the 125% correct answer.
"Oh, I'm so glad to hear that!" in an instant, Blackfire swiped your little body off your bed again and held you tightly... thankfully, not TOO tight.. a few of your ribs might still be broken from earlier! "...Because I already set up the wedding ceremony!"
"...You... you what?"
Blackfire blushed a little, "I uh... kinda already set up our wedding ceremony while you were still kidnapped by sis and her friends. I just had a hunch you'd say yes!"

WHAT?! She already planned out a wedding ceremony for the two of you?! Imagine what wouldve happened if you said no... a tamaranean hug wouldve been the LEAST of your problems!
You didnt even have enough time to regret what you said. In a split-second, Blackfire jumped into the air and flew straight out of the room with you in her grasp. After a short while of screaming off the top of your lungs, the flight comes to a direct stop.

"Here we are!" Blackfire announced to you as you looked around at some abandoned werehouse full of white sheets covering several chairs and tables lined up in rows with several mannequins sitting in each seat. In front of you is a dusty wooden alter and a broken piano in the corner.

Is THIS supposed to be the 'wedding-ceremony' she set up? Not a very good job there.
"Uh... is this the place?" you asked her, "I expected something a little more..."
"Glamorous?" Blackfire interrupted you. You nodded silently. Blackfire simply smiled a little deviously, "Oh dont worry. This little baby will fix that!"

That black crystal in her other hand shined brightly as a darkened aura flowed around it. After one big flash of light, the werehouse around changed dramatically.

It was no longer a werehouse. Instead, you find yourself at the alter of a humongous white cathedral with windows laced in white satin curtains, a velvet carpet placed on the floor, the scent of roses filled the room, a humongous white cake with a minature bride and groom on top, mannequins turned into several people dressed up in fancy suits and dresses, and even a pianist playing the 'Wedding March' on the big organ in the corner of the room!

NOW it's a wedding! That black crystal is really something.

Speaking of which, you look down and notice your clothes have just changed into a fine-suited tuxedo with a rose-clipping! When you look back up at Blackfire, you notice her clothes changed too! Her silver body suit and skirt changed into a lovely black wedding gown with colorful jewels and glitter encrusted into it, several golden bracelets covering many unique markings tattooed on her arms, and a silver crown over her black lacey tiara. Damn... she really pulled off all the stops for her marriage ceremony!

To add to the most important day of your life, guess who the minister is?!

"Dearly beloved..." spoke the eerily accented voice of the red-haired puppet that threatened your very life twice! White Reaper! But as big as Blackfire now!
"We are gathered here today," he continued as he read what looked like a bible, but the title of the book was written in unfamiliar text (Tamaranean, perhaps?), "to unite two intergalactic kindred-spirits on their path towards ultimate glory and a better future for all that inhabit the universe for many generations to come. Before beginning the path of conquering the universe with the mightiest galactic empire serving under them, they are to conquer the very bond between them... to come together as one in holy matrimony."

Sweat drips off your forehead as the sermon continues. This was extremely nerve-wrecking for someone like you. To not only marry a total stranger, but to marry a total stranger from another planet almost a hundred times your size and soon-to-be tyrannical overlord of the universe. Your fate had been sealed.

"Queen Komand'r a.k.a. Lady Blackfire, do you take this diminutive human of earth, [your name here] to rule alongside you as your lawfully-wedded husband for better or for worse, in sickness and in health, as long as you both shall live?"
"I do," she looked down at you with a big smile. Nice to see SHE was having a blast! Only one thing left now to make this day complete....

"[Your name here]," the Reaper looked down at you with an eerie grin, "do you take the Tamaranean Queen Blackfire to rule alongside you as your lawfully-wedding wife for better or worse, in sickness and in health... UNTIL DEATH DO YOU PART?!!!"

"I...I....I......"
143211221222122121111.title: Wedding Jitters

choices: The Teen Titans crash the wedding...and all hell breaks loose!!!!!
1432112212221221211111.content:
"I...I....I......"

Your eyes dart around, as if expecting someone to show up, seeing no one, you relax.

You take a deep breath and smile up at the bride, "I do." you say.

"Then by the power bestowed on me by the soon-to-be ruler of the intergalactic empire,
Queen Blackfire of Tamaran, I now pronounce you husband and wife. You may kiss the bride." White Reaper said, Blackfire reached down and picked you up and brought you to her face, you know what's going to happen. Well, you WERE offically married to her, so why not? As you and Blackfire's lips near echother, your enveloped by a orb of black enegry and you feel something moving through your memories, focousing on the ones were Blackfire tells you she plans to take over and form a intergalactic empire, how you chose to marry her, and how you want to try and keep there from being an intergaltic war as soon as you and her are married.

Ho-no!!!

Blackfire stares at you, trapped in the orb, then turns and glares hatfully at the back of the room were the door was.

"I should've known! Reaper! Get rid of them!!!!" your new wife snarles, whipping off her silver crown over her black lacey tiara. Yep, she was pissed that they were wrecking her wedding!!!

"At once, Queen Komand'r!!!" the life-sized doll says and snapped theTamaranean bible shut. Just then, the wall blows inward, and the wedding-crashers that had you worried before you said "I do." show up.
1432112212221221211111.title: I do

14321122122212212111111.content:
Of all the people to crash the most important day of your life and your evil bride-to-be's. If only it were a nasty group like H.I.V.E. or the Brotherhood of Evil, then you wouldnt feel as bad letting your almighty Queen obliterate them! But noooo... it had to be the young Heroes of Legend themselves... the Teen Titans!

The cocky masked boy-wonder, Robin, the short greenish guy with pointy ears, Beast Boy, and the big buff half-man half-machine, Cyborg! ...wait! Where's Raven and Starfire?

"Sorry, Blackfire!" Robin announced, "but I'm afraid theyre aint gonna be a wedding. But there will be a funeral if you dont tell us where Raven is!"
Something happened to Raven? WHAT happened to Raven? Maybe it mightve had something to do with what White Reaper showed you back when you were Jinx's slave!

From where you were standing, you had a good view of Blackfire glaring back at them, gritting her teeth and clenching her glowing fists.

The White Reaper, on the other hand zipped in front of both you, ready to defend the both of you.
"This is your final warning, trespassers," he warned the three, "Leave now and you'll be spared an excruciatingly painful demise... at least an EARLY one, anyway!"
Cyborg, not looking the least bit intimidated just pointed his cannon toward the reaper, "Why am I not the least bit scared Im being threatened by a My-Size gothic Ken doll?" and fired!
*PASSSHHHOOOMMM!!!*

A transparent barrier appeared before the White Reaper, shielding him from the blast. With a snap of his finger, several of the wedding cast members' eyes turned red and they descended upon the Teen Titans!
It didnt take long before the entire wedding crew were battling it out against the wedding crashers. And what was worse, you were standing in front of the action, trapped in a black ball!

Cyborg tried blasting back the endless number of bridesmaids and best-men surrounding him from all sides, Beast Boy transformed into an elephant and trampled over several chairs and tables knocking over everyone and everything in his way, and Robin fenced one-on-one against the White Reaper matching his sharp scythe move-for-move with his trusty extendable cane.
The whole wedding ceremony was being torn to ruins by your heroic rescuers and the Reaper's living doll minions. Fearing that sooner or later you'll be caught in the middle of it, you tried to run, but you couldnt budge the black aura encasing you!

Thankfully, Blackfire swiped you up off the altar and snuck out of the side-exit with you in her grasp. Though you were slightly relieved she pulled you out of that mess, youre even more terrified she pulled you in an even bigger one!
The future of your world is looking worse and worse. It doesnt look like the Teen Titans will gladly accept their banishment when Tamaran takes over. If anything, they'll revolt like they did with your wedding! And what if they get others to side with them? Like the Titans East or Justice League, or maybe even team up with the villains to stop the Empire! Maybe even team up with Freedom Fighters from other planets and cause one big intergalactic war!! Do you really want THAT on your shoulders with the woman you love?

Speaking of which... "Um... Blackfire?"
"Yes, my beloved soulmate?" she replied sweetly trying to hide her desperation.
"Robin said something about Raven being missing. What happened to her?"
"Why does it matter?"
"Because THAT'S why theyre mad!" you exclaim, "whatever happens to one of the Titans gets the rest of the group involved! What did you do to Raven?"
"Nothing that'll compare to what I'll do to the rest of Starfire's friends for ruining my special day!" your bride-to-be replied as she pulled out that black crystal again. The cause of all your pain and suffering thus far! "But first, let me get rid of that awful black orb surrounding your precious body..."

*ZZAAPP!!* "Arrggh!" before she could free you of that little prison, a green projectile shot Blackfire from behind causing her to drop you and her crystal!

The blast came from the glowing hands of ANOTHER Tamaranean girl. A red-haired girl with green eyes wearing a purple top, purple boots, and a purple skirt. Starfire!

"Sister," Starfire hovered over her sister and glared down at her, "I cannot allow you to escape the justice for all the crimes you have committed. You have stolen a dangerous artifact of pure evil and threatened the innocent lives of my friends and our people all because of your selfish desire and lust!"

Blackfire got up off the ground and glared back at her, "I did what was necessary for the future of Tamaran. I refuse to bow to a weak soft-hearted coward unwilling to use the power that's handed to her on a silver platter!" And with that, she leaped at her sister.

You stared in fear of both of them as they wrestled eachother to the ground. Soon, it looked as though Starfire was overpowering her sister.
"It is over, sister!" she grabbed Blackfire's arms and pinned them down, "you cannot win!"

"Urrggghhh..." Blackfire struggled in vain at the mercy of her sister. But then she looked over to you and smiled, "Heh! Youre forgetting... there's TWO of us! [YOUR NAME]! NOW!! Use the crystal!"
What?! She expects you to use her crystal to save her?! But you dont even know how to use it... yet, judging by the way it's rumbling, you have a strange feeling you dont need to!

Even Starfire looked back at you in shock! "No! Please do not, minature earth person! That crystal possesses powers far too dangerous for any being to comprehend!"
"Dont listen to her! I have faith in you! Use it!!"
"NO! STOP!"
"YES! DO IT!"

It wasnt your choice whether or not you'd use it.. it was however, your choice on who you'd use it on! When the rumble finally stopped, a thin black beam shot out from the shard. Question is, who did it shoot?
14321122122212212111111.title: It's never easy being the villain

choices: Your body is destroyed along with Anti-Monitor's crystal, your now a ghost
143211221222122121111112.content:
The crystal shook, like it was angry at who you blasted, then the crystal shrank and flew at you, landing on your forehead and a black ooze came from it and you body glowed with a grey energy, it hurt for some reasson, and was going hellishly slowly as it taking over you body sothat you were in even more pain.

That was when a giant raven-shaped spirit pulled you spirit out of your body as the crystal infected it. There was something fimalir about the spirit, something that made you feel safe. When you feel solid ground, you were normal sized and were standing on a free-floating rock.

"Huh?" you say

"Your in my mind." a voice you find to be a welcome sound said, you whip around and see Raven standing there, you hug her.

"What happened?" you asked after letting her go

"The villans have got me, luckly I was able to connect with you when you tried to contact me earlier, I know the only reasson you were going through the motions of that wedding was to prevent a war. Look, we've got bigger problems. That crystal is acctually the main Black Lantern central power battery, The story of the Black Lantern begins during the Sinestro Corps War, when the Sinestro Corps declared war on the Guardians Of The Universe and the Green Lantern Corps. Enraged at the defeat the Sinestro Corps was suffering, Superman Prime hurled the Anti-Monitor's body into deep space.After drifting in space the Anti-Monitor's shriveled and substantially weakened physical form crash-landed on a dark, barren planet. After the damage suffered on Earth, the Anti-Monitor was unable to protect himself when the ground around him began to envelop him, forming a Black Lantern Power Battery. Over time, the Anti-Monitor learned how to change the form of the Black Lantern Power Battery into the form of that crystal she had, after that, he forced it to open a worm-hole and sent the black crystal to earth were he found he needed someone else to work the crystal's power there." You screamed for what seemed like nearly an eternity as the blast engulfed you. To say the pain was unlike anything youve ever felt would be an understatement! It feels like youre being cut and burnt all over at the exact same time! But you force yourself to endure... you trust Raven and Specter... well, not so much Specter, but Raven trusts him so you trust him too!

It was only a matter of time before the pain finally stopped and everything went white...

********************

You finally woke. The first thing you managed to see was the sun in the sky. Raven and Specter were nowhere to be seen. You turned your head and saw that very warehouse you came out of a while ago. You were back!
Not only that, but just aways away, you notice the Tamaranean sisters lying on the floor unconscious. Strange thing was, besides both of them being knocked out, they werent towering over you anymore! They were both your size!

YOURE BIG AGAIN!
"I'm...I'm big again!" you shouted in excitement, "I'M BIG AGAIN!!! YES!! YEAH!! WOO HOO!!" You even jumped for joy and thrusted your arms a couple of times in celebration. Wow... you never thought you'd be THIS glad to be back to your normal size again. Not that youre back to your old self again, youre more than willing to marry Blackfire and take the galactic throne, but after everything that's happened so far, it's probably not gonna happen. The crystal of the Anti-Monitor was in pieces. Oh well. That's what you expect for falling for a villainess.

Speaking of which, that's when you remembered! Blackfire! As you rushed up to her, Starfire had already came too.
"Um... sister?" she gently shook Blackfire a little, "Sister, are you alright? Please wake up!" How sweet. Despite everything she did to her, Starfire STILL has the decency to care for her well-being.
"Uggh.....oohh...." Blackfire started waking up, "...uh...huh?" with a jumpstart! "[YOUR NAME]!!" she screamed as she pushed Starfire and rushed toward you, "My love! Are you alright?!"

Heh! What do you know?! She really does care for you that much! You smiled and open your arms wide for her as she rushed toward you...

*WOOSH!*

She ran right THROUGH you! "What the...?!" you wondered to yourself as you turned around and saw Blackfire kneeling over you! Not YOU you, but you just a couple feet away from you! There's another you lying on the ground unconscious... no... that's your body! Youre a ghost! You said you'd die to you had to to stop the threat of the Anti-Monitor's crystal... You got your wish.

Too bad Blackfire didnt know.
"[Your name], c'mon! Please be alright! I... I didnt mean to let you get hurt over this! Wake up! Please wake u-AAUUCCKKK!!"
You woke up. Or at least your body did. And the first thing it did was grab Blackfire by the neck!
"SISTER!"

"Blackfire!" you screamed, but you knew you couldnt do a thing in your situation! You could only watch 'yourself' open it's dilated blackened eyes and glare at the poor Tamaranean possibly choking to death in his grasp.

"I am very much fine," 'you' spoke in a cold gloomy voice as a darkened aura flowed around his body, "thank you so much little girl. I feel so much better now." You couldnt believe your body doing such a thing. Especially to a Tamaranean! Incredible super-strength, and yet Blackfire's gasping and turning pale from a human's squeeze. Unless 'you' aint a human anymore!

With a hard swing, your body tossed Blackfire aside and got up off the ground. He turned his dilated eyes toward the bits of crystal shattered everywhere and grinned. "Heh! How beautiful... such a pretty little object crafted by the universe's most powerful imbecile... destroyed by lowly mortals such as this. No wonder Sinestro Corps was doomed from the beginning!" Oh crap... it knows about that? Who exactly is that speaking through your body?

Starfire helped her sister off the ground as Blackfire rubbed her neck and stare at you in fear, "[Your.....Your Name]?"

"HA!!" 'you' let out one sharp cackle, "you mean your fiancee? I'm afraid he's long gone... waiting for you in that very place where trillions of other mortals such as yourself will soon join!" 'you' tapped your chest, "He left THIS behind, and since I didnt want to come back as a girl and it wasnt like he was going to use it anymore... well... here I am!"

"This...person..." Starfire squinted her eyes and sweated a bit, "I sense a very dark aura flowing within this human's shell.... the same as the crystal's, only... stronger!"

"Very perceptive, little lady!" 'you' smiled at stepped a bit closer to the sisters, causing them to step a little back, "I am what happens when you abuse such an incredible, devistating, godlike tool created for massive galactic threat!" he said it proudly, "Hmm... let's see... what was it you mortals used to call me? ...Ah yes! Atomsk!"

'Atomsk?' Who the hell is that?! Where's the Anti-Monitor?!
"Atomsk?"

"Technically, I'm the very essence of Anti-matter incarnate, but I'm sure adolescent creatures like yourself are far too young to understand such complicated science!" Atomsk grinned, "however, I will say that this galaxy's essence is unclean for a being such as me to prosper. I'm afraid I will have purge it... starting with this planet!" ...He's gonna destroy the earth?! Such is anti-matter... matter and anti-matter cannot co-exist.

"I am afraid that we will not allow you to harm this world, anti-existing zombie!" Starfire snapped at him, although she was still a bit weakened from earlier. And unfortunately, the rest of the Teen Titans werent in such good shape, either.
White Reaper and his puppet-army marched out of the warehouse carrying the unconscious Robin, Cyborg, and Beast Boy in their grasp! The heroes lost.

But what about the villains?!
"Grrr..." Blackfire glared at Atomsk, "White Reaper! Destroy this loon!"
Her trusty red-haired death-doll in white... did nothing.
Atomsk grinned, and pointed at Blackfire, "White Reaper... purify this child!"

"As you wish, my liege," White Reaper graciously accepted Atomsk's order!

Like hell you were just gonna stand around and watch! But what could you do?! Youre a ghost!

...unless....

1432112212221221221.content:
H.I.V.E. Academy is a monumental maze. Endless halls full of dorms belonging to giant blood-thirsty students with magical powers. Destructive powers + villain status + Teen oangst = BAAAAADDDD combination!

Thankfully, the halls were practically empty. Not an evil villain student in site as far as the eye can see. Which is good, because a lot those that were still hanging on inside their rooms were NOT sleeping. You can lots of loud noises in almost every room you pass. Loud music cranked up to max, partying, reckless fighting, possibly a drunken orgy going off somewhere... geez, H.I.V.E. security is just terrible!!

You even listened in on friendly chatter going off in one of the rooms. A rather stern and possibly angered guy and his eerily calm sister threatening a poor terrified boy that you assume might be a freshman:
"For the last time, Dwayne... where is the Chronos Stone?!"
"I... I told you, Aries! I dont know!"
"Then let me help you refresh your memory! WHERE WAS IT THE LAST TIME YOU HAD IT?!"
"Uh...uh... let's see.... um... by the pool, I think... I... uh oh.."
"He's very clumsy, isnt he big brother? Letting such a powerful object get all soaked and wet."
"Wait! I-I-I'll go get it back! J...j...just let me-"
"Grimm... ya mind getting out your friend, Sharpy?"
"Not at all, big brother." *KINK!* you heard the sound of a blade drop. Probably a very one too! "Sharpy wants to give him a nice sweet kiss on his cheek. Can she, brother?"
"Oh by all means, pucker up Sharpy!"
"No! N-NO!! NOOOOOEEEEEEYYYYAAAAAARRRGGGHHHH!!!"

The moment you heard that last scream, you ran like hell as far away from that room as possible. Looks like White Reaper's got his work cut out for him.
Can you honestly believe the luckiest day in the world just turned into THIS?! The same day you found a winning lottery ticket on the ground was the same day you were shrunken down, forced to pick Death out of a Teen Titan's teeth, and made a slave by a model student in one of the scariest schools known to mankind?

Still, you'd probably rather be here than where the Titan's are... in the hands of Slade!

Anyway, it feels like you've the SAME exact hallway about thirty times. You dont even remember where Jinx's room is anymore. Youre completely lost.
You cant keep running around forever, ESPECIALLY after that exhausting foot-rub.

And if you thought THAT was painful, morning came. You looked up at the clock on the wall... just a few more minutes until 7am, when the bell rings!

Better find a hiding spot fast, otherwise......... well, use your imagination!

"Uh... I guess?" you replied, not having a clue what she's talking about... but that wont last for long!

"Good!" Jinx smiles as she starts to slowly slip off those purple and black striped stockings of hers, "Because this next task of yours is gonna require a very professional diver... one that can dive as deep into the depth as possibly for a LONG period of time!"

You dont like where this is going! "W....what kind of diver are you looking for, anyway?!"
"Muff."
"Muff?" you wonder to yourself, "What the hell is a muff.............................. diver...."

Oh dear. Jinx is starting to raise her skirt a little! So much, you can barely make out a pale inverted lip with pink hair the same color as on her head! Oh damn... is THIS what she meant by a 'Muff diver'?!

"Y..Y...YOU.....YOU..." you stutter off the top of your lungs, flinching with every syllable, "YOU....WANT ME TO..." you point in between Jinx's legs, "TO....TO... EEGGHH?!" Jinx grins and nods. NOT a good thing. A really really really really really really RLY bad thing!
"B...BUT YOURE....YOURE... EEHHH!" you extend your arms, signing that she's big, "A...AND IM... IM... EEEE!!" you shorten your hands together, signing that youre small, "AND...AND....and you dont even care, do you?" Jinx just shakes her head.

You cant let this happen. Of all the things Jinx could do to you at your current size... you cannot let this happen!!! Aw, damnit... why did you have to be shrunk?!
Wait a minute. That's it!

"W-w-w-WAIT, Jinx!"
She immediately flashed a menacing glare because you called her the wrong name!
"Uh, Im sorry! I mean Mistress Jinx!!" you correct yourself, "W...why should you bother soiling... your hands on such a tiny insignificant person like me? Um... I mean in my current state! D...Didnt you say that you wished I was a little bigger, because of 'the possibilities'?"
That last quote caused your giant and possibly anticipating sorceress to raise her eyebrow. Good. Maybe she'll listen!

"Yes! Um.. youre quite uh... knowledgable to powerful spells. Perhaps you know of a spell that could make me bigger...s.....so I could make things even more fun for you!"

Jinx just sighed, "Unfortunately, size-changing spells are kind out of my league. The best I could do is probably manipulate a size-change for about a few minutes top and-" Her pink eye's widened the moment she stopped in mid-sentence! Changing you big for only a FEW minutes...

You say with a forced smile and ignore your nausea, "Let me have those few minutes. I'll satisfy that lovely pale peach of yours with-"
"With your tongue!" she interrupted you, "Heh! Youre still my slave! You aint gonna get THAT luxury... LITTLE boy!"

You groaned, "Ok, fine! Just make me big again!! Pretty please, my...." you took another deep breath, "...lovely, generous, and incredibly gorgeous mistress?!"
Yeah, youre desperate. But will that be enough? Just those few minutes of being big. That's all you ask for.

Question is, will you get them?

"S....sorry..." you apologize, "I was a little... distracted."
"Yeah, well stop thinking about your 'girlfriend' and start thinking about your mistress!!"

Urrrgghh... where is Raven when you need her? Surely whatever she's going through is nowhere near as scary as what youre doing! Spending what's left of your 'BIG' time going down on an evil sorceress in the middle of a villain academy. You gotta get out of here before it's too late.

14321122122212222122.content:
Good news is that blow across Jinx's face hit her hard. REAL hard! No doubt hurting like a real sumbitch! Safe to say you almost knocked her teeth out with it... bad news is that it DIDNT knock her out!

Word to the wise: the next time you clobber a powerful evil sorceress upside the head as hard as you can, you better make damn sure she's out cold... or dead! Preferably dead, so she wont wake up and crave revenge!
Unfortunately, you failed to heed that word, and because of your inability to get the job done, harsh HARSH consequences await you!

Jinx gradually got up off the ground, breathing heavily and harshly as she turned her head back you and glared... deep into your soul. Her purple eyes were glowing as she stared back at you. Blood was dripping from her lip. Safe to say she was pissed. And safe to say that it's far far FAR FAAAAAAARRRR FAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR too late to start sayng youre sorry!

She clenched her fist and wiped a little blood off her lip as she smiled. "Heh!" Jinx chuckled, "Well... you never told me you liked it rough! I'll be more than happy to oblige... little boy!"
You were only seconds away from getting down on your knees and pleading for your life, but it was too late for you. She immediately grabbed the end of your leash, and with one harsh tug, tighted that hold to your throat pretty hard! The single jerk almost caused you to joke, but thankfully you can still breathe.

"EYAAH!"
"OOMPH!" Jinx then kicked you so hard, it knocked you onto her bed. The moment you landed on your back, strange metal cuffs popped out of the bed and restrained both your wrists. Your arms were locked and pinned against Jinx's bed! You struggled to break free, but to no avail. The cuffs were too strong and resistant for a normal non-superhuman type to break out of.
And to make the night much sweeter, the cuffs took away your bit of self-against against your current captor.

Jinx, no doubt still pretty pissed about her busted lip, climbed up on top of you and sat on your chest... still glaring down with those glowing purple eyes twinkling with murderous rage. You'd rather be shrunk again then be stuck in THIS position, but it's not for you to decide!

Every single hard breath and sigh she took seemed like forever as you were left at her mercy, waiting for your punishment to finally commence.
Jinx cracked her knuckles again....

"GrrrRRAAAHHH!!!" Jinx let out what seemed to be a insane battle cry as she raised one hand in the air and brought it down toward you at mach speed!
*SLAP!* She slapped you. HARD. Grade-A Supervillain 'Shut up, bitch!' Hard! It hurt quite a bit, but she wasnt done yet!
*SLAP!* She slapped you again. Equally hard, but with her other hand.
*SLAP!* And again with her other hand!
*SLAP!* And again!
*SLAP!* And again!

*Slap slap slap slap SLAP!* Five times in a row! Man, your cheeks are stinging! You wanted to scream in pain, but you bit your tongue during the third slap!
...She STILL wasnt done!

Apparently just slapping you wasnt enough to satisfy Jinx's bloodthirsty rage, so she got creative. She picked up both her booths... and started swinging like crazy in your face!

*Thump! Thump! Thump! Thump! THUMP!* Over and over and over, she beat your head senseless with the heels of your booths! Struck your forehead, struck your nose, struck your cheeks, and struck your jaw repeatedly! You could feel the blood gushing out of your nostrils as well as a bit from your mouth!
Needless to say, this was practically the worst beating you have ever endured in your entire life! You were left lying there so helpless, almost blacking out as you were beating severely for godknows how long! You were getting awful dizzy... in your mind, you prayed that you would pass out soon. Too bad your prayer was never answered.

Finally after what seemed like FOREVER, Jinx got tired. She finally stopped her onslaught and dropped her boots. Then she desperately tried catching her breath, possibly tired and exhausted from your punishment. Wow... your beating took quite a toll on her! Of course nowhere near as much as it took on YOU, but thankfully it stopped!

After taking her last breath, Jinx glared down at you once more. You sweated a little, that is if it's blood youre feeling dripping down your face, as you gazed in horror and agony.
"Now.... where were we?" she sighed as you notice a little purple fire lit on her fingertip, "Ah yes..." She then pointed that very finger just about an inch in front of your eye! "...you still had a job to do!"
She edged a bit closer to your face and lifted up her skirt a little, still pointing her flamin' finger at your eye!

Oh dear! She STILL wants to see that 'tongue of yours in action'! This time, your choices are limited. You cant struggle, you cant break free, and you so most certainly cant resist, otherwise, not only will you be bruised and battered, you'll be burnt alive!

Nothing else you can do other than go down on your mistress like a good boy. Because you know what happens when youre a BAD boy!
14321122122212222122.title: Naughty Boys Get Punished

choices: You get the collar off, escape Jinx's room & run into "Stone" (Cyborg)
Too late! You shrink and Jinx comes back into her room
143211221222122221222.content:
Just as you were about to do what the pissed -off sorceress was forcing you, the bell for first period rang. Jinx snarled at you as she the leash to the wall, but she suddenly smiled nastyly at you.

"Stay put. I'll be back soon, and once that enlargement spell wears off, you're mistress is going to teach you not to get on her bad side like that again! In the meantime, I'll be using the time apart to think up how to punish you...then again...maybe I won't need to think about it, my bare feet've missed you since you finished massaging them."

Hearing that, you pale.

Laughing at your expression, Jinx left her room in a good mood.

NO WAY IN HELL WERE YOU STAYING PUT!!!! You start to struggle to remove the collar, but it seems Jinx was a step ahead of you, you can't take it off by yourself. Panic and desperation make you keep trying to get it off though. Jinx never told you just HOW MANY minutes you had until you shrink again. Just perfect! And Jinx isn't stupid, she'll keep you small after what you did!
143211221222122221222.title: THANK YOU GOD FOR BUYING ME SOME TIME!!!!!!!

1432112212221222212221.content:
What you lack in the physical strength to take on a supervillainess like Jinx, you make up for in keen intellect to outsmart the little witchling. As luck would have it, you find a little button on the wall above you marked 'Dream & Scream Bed and Restraint Device'.That must control the collars. Sure, you cant reach it, but you know what can!
Fortunately, your hands were cuffed down instead of up so you'll be able to reach your pocket. Now if your little buddy's still in there, you just may might be able to escape...

SUCCESS! Your lucky marble! Always there when you really really need it! In your head, you measured the distance between your hand at the button, measured the kind of angle you would have to throw the marble at to hit the button, calculated the wind currents, weighed the density of the marble over your weight on the bed, divided it by 3.1, applied Newton's 2nd Law of Motion, then kinda got a little confused and thought 'Screw it' and just tossed the stupid marble!

*click!* SUCCESS AGAIN! All the cuffs came off! Youre free! Now you can finally leave this damn place. But although you were in a tremendous hurry because of Jinx as we well as the limited time her enlargement spell has, your face and bleeding and aching so you went into the dorm room bathroom to look for some first aid.
Sure enough, the bathroom was pink and fuzzy! Pink fuzzy carpet, pink lacy curtains, beautiful rose plants aside the sink, even a pink fuzzy top on the toilet seat! Man, you hate those girly-girl bathrooms! But you tried to pay that no mind as you looked at yourself in the mirror. There's a purple bruise on your cheek, a blackeye, and your nose was dripping with blood. She did quite a number on you, huh? You look through the dressers and found a bottle of rubbing alcohol. After wiping the blood out of your nose with several tissues and rubbing some stinging alcohol on your already stinging cheek, you darted out of the place!

Sadly, getting out of Jinx's room was the EASY part. The hard part is navigating your way out of the endless maze that is HIVE Academy. The halls seem to go on forever as they twist and turn. All the while you pass several other students chatting amongst themselves, passing you by, not so much at dotting an eye at you. On the plus side, nobody's in school uniform so at least you wont stick out like a sore face-er, thumb!

"Oof!" just then, your thoughts of escape were cut off by you bumping into someone. ...oh crap, the dude's friend are giving you a cold stare as if bumping into somebody was considered a high offense. However that didnt scare you as much as the big dude you bumped into did!
He was big, black, bulky, bald-headed, muscular all over, and had a big gray unibrow that was incredibly difficult NOT to spot!
You took a deep breath as you awaited his mercy... when you noticed a look of concern on him. His eyes widened as he looked at your bruises.

"Whoa..." he muttered as he took a good look at you, "what happened to your face? Oh man, these guys did a number on you?" What did he mean by 'these guys'? Was he feeling sorry for you?
"UH! I mean, outta my way, shrimp!" just then, his mood made a 180 turn and he rudely shoved you out of his way with just a swing of his hand!

"Heh! That's teaching the little twerp, Stone!" one of his buddies commented as they laughed about it along their way.
"Uh...jerk?" you scratched the back of your head as you tried to shrug it off. Seriously, what was up with that Stone-guy?
Eh, forget about him. He's just another villain spawn and bred into a criminal mastermind in HIVE Academy. Your top focus is get out of the academy before you shrink again...

Speaking of which, after a while of wondering around, you finally reach the front gate! Good... but the question is 'Can you get out'?
1432112212221222212221.title: The Easy Part's over... now here's the Hard Part!

choices: Are you getting shorter? (CRUD! The spell's wearing off!)
14321122122212222122212.content:
NO! The gate's heavily guarded!

Just then, someone tapped your shoulder and you turn to see some blue-eyed blond ninja your age. He wore a pair of baggy black pants with pockets on the sides, a kunai case at his right thigh, and a studded belt looped around his waist with two equipment pouches at the small of his back, and steel-soled combat boots like Robin's. He had his a sleeveless shirt with a mask pulled up over his lower face, a red T-shit with a black spiral put onto the left shoulder, a black headband with a red swirl over his forehead and his Shin/Forearm guards and gloves. He also had a black armored vest that was of an odd design, having shoulder and neck armor of some kind of vest, was made of thick black leather with mesh weaved into the inside, while the bottom was rolled up with thick buckles over it that held it onto his body.

"Your who tin-head told me about? He wasn't kidding, you got beaten alright. Call me Tempest."

"Uh...can you help me?" you ask.

Tempest's response was...
14321122122212222122212.title: Possible help

143211221222122221222122.content:
He looked like he was just microseconds away from answering your question (hopefully, he'd say yes!), but then his expression changed to sort of a surprised look. As if he noticed something was off! "Uh... is it just me," Tempest put a hand on his chin and raised his eyebrow, "or are you getting shorter?"

Not understanding what he's talking about, you tilted your head and said "What?"
"I couldve sworn you were a bit taller just a couple seconds ago," he remarked, "Hm... maybe I was just imagini-No, you definitely shrunk right there!"
"What the hell are you ta........" you cut yourself off in midsentence after realizing you went from face-to-face to face-to-rather-muscley-chest! You are shrinking!
...Oh crap! Jinx's spell! It's wearing off! Now you got plenty more to fear aside of being trapped in Bad-Guy School and suffering more of Jinx's wrath when she finds out you escaped!

"OH man this is bad!" you muttered, "I'm dead or a lab rat if I dont get outta here, soon!" You were at your panicky stage once again. And to make matters worse, it seemed like Tempest wasnt really feeling very sorry for you.
He just shook his head and tsked, "Well... this IS HIVE Academy. What did you expect when you came here in the first place? A yearly session of Koombayah?"
"YOU THINK I'D BE STUPID ENOUGH TO COME HERE ON MY OWN FREE WILL?!!" you snapped at the guy... then immediately regretted it as you found looking up to him, "I... I was shrunken down and kidnapped! By a pink-haired pyromaniac that probably came out of Cirque du Soleil!"

His eyes widened the moment he heard that. He mustve known who youre talking about. "Jinx?! THAT twisted little freak?" Good, he DOES know who youre talking about. This should make things much easier now!
"Yes! Yes! Absolutely," you nodded over and over, "she brought me here and... well... let's just say I.. convinced her to put a growth spell on me, then when I resisted, she... yeah..." you pointed at the bruises on your face, "...I can only imagine what she'll do to me when she finds out I escaped!" Have no fear! Your Superhero is here! You can always depend on the kindness of Heroes... of the Super kind! After all, Justice is.. uh... what true Superheroes... um... strive for... or something.

"That is terrible," Tempest lowered his head and sigh, "...well, best of luck to you!" ...And headed off?! That's not what Superheroes are supposed to do!
"HEY WAIT!!" you stop him, "I'm in danger here! I need your help!"
Sadly, he was not your savior. "Sorry pal," he told you, "but I already got a job to do, involving a recon infiltration. If I bring you with you, you'll just blow my cover and the entire school will be on us." Aww... you couldnt believe he's actually choosing some stupid recon mission over helping someone in need!
"So... youre just gonna leave me here?!"
"Sorry, but this mission's a little more important than babysitting Jinx's tiny boyfriend." 'More important'... 'babysitting'.... 'boyfriend'... Man, you were REALLY holding back the urge to scream! What a jerk! Fine! You know when youre not wanted...

"Oh.....death...... ooooooooooh death.... wont ya spare me 'til another year?" just through the corner of your eye, you noticed a familiar looking red-headed student sitting by a tree playing his guitar and singing, "....well, what is this that I cant see... but icecold hands taking hold of me..."

Damnit... you'll have to face it: Tempest is your only friend (or the closest thing to a friend) in this entire academy other than 'Stone' (who is long gone!) and a bona fined Superhero.
"Well, I am Death, none can excel... I'll open the door to Heaven or Hell..."
You were desperate. You needed a Superhero to save you. And if you wanted Tempest to help you, you could not be above begging!

"Wait! Listen, Aqualad-"
"Tempest!"
"Ohhh Death, someone would pray... could you wait to call me another day?"
"...Aqualad, I am begging you," you literally got down on your knees, "I am a desperate man far from home with nobody else to turn to in this scary godforsaken place. Who knows how long I been lost here. I dont even know if I still have a family waiting for me back home anymore! I-"
"The children prayed, the preacher preached... time and mercy is out of your reach..."
"I-I'm not gonna last long like this... I know I wont! So I'm begging, I'm down on my knees! Help me... please!"

Tempest had a serious look on his face. He knew you were in trouble. No point in thinking otherwise, you were in the worst place you'd ever be at the worst moment of time. Still, have you actually opened his heart enough so that he'd help you out?
"I'll fix your feet so you cant walk.... I'll lock your jaw so you cant talk..."
Or is his mission more important than your very life?!
143211221222122221222122.title: Socialized Heroism

1432112212221222212221222.content: ......,..Tempest thought for a second and just as he was about to help you loud footsteps start booming twoards the both of you. " sorry small frie duty calls and tempest was gone the footsteps reviled to be....
1432112212221222212221222.title: "Sorry... duty calls."

14321122122212222122212222.content:
As if a superhero refusing to save your life wasnt a horrible enough experience, you overheard loud, rather anxious stomping heading toward your direction. They were coming for you. You knew they were coming for you! You silently prayed to God/Allah/Buddah/The Voice/Alrise/Dalmech/YaHuWeiHa/Superman/other that it wasnt Jinx.. otherwise, you'd be meeting the very one youre praying to soon enough! (except Superman... unless this takes place sometime after he got killed by Doomsday)

"HEY SHRIMP!!" you overheard a loud, obnoxious bratty male voice call out to you! Thankfully, it wasnt Jinx! You never felt more relieved to be called 'shrimp' instead of 'little boy'. Still, you werent in the clear yet.
You turned around to see a short (although a few inches taller than you at this point!) bald-headed kid in a green jumpsuit wearing what seemed to be a utility belt strapped around his waste and remote control panel on his chest as well as a pair of weird goggles. You recognize this brat too. Gizmo, the crazy diabolical gadget-creating geek. You didnt find him threatening as much as you did just plain annoying, but he is a star student of HIVE, so that he's a force to be reckoned with! You couldnt help but note the orange sash on his arm...

"Youre late for class, shrimp!" Gizmo crossed his arms and smirked, "where's your hall pass?!" Oh goodie... he's the school monitor...

"I.... I dont have one," you honestly admitted.

"Not a good day to be skipping class, shrimp!" he pulled out a little remote from his utility belt, "you see, we got orders to take REAL good care of those who violate HIVE Academy's school rules!"
You could detect a hint of deviousness and cruel intentions when he said that!
"..'We'?"
"Yep!" Gizmo nodded, "me and my... deputy!" He clicked a button on the remote.
In a quick instant, you saw something running toward your direction at mach speed! In just a blink of an eye, it was standing right in front of you! A tall man in a fancy butler outfit! Actually, a tall blue haired, blue eyed man in a fancy butler outfit. Actually ACTUALLY, a tall blue haired blue eyed man made of metal in a fancy butler outfit! Seriously, his entire skin was completely made of silver metal! Fitting... Gizmo's got a robot butler by his side!
The robot smiled and turned his head to Gizmo and bowed, "You have called for me, Master Gizmo?" he spoke in a polite yet slightly monotone voice.

"You bet I did," Gizmo remarked then turned his head to you, not noticing you shrunk another inch while he was talking, "Shrimp, I'd like you to meet my deputy! A little something I whipped up in shop-class!"
"It is an absolute pleasure to make your acquaintance, Mr. Shrimp," the robot butler smiled at you and bowed politely, "I am Butl3r. I am a fully sentient, multi-functional automaton created for the sole purpose of assisting my strong-willed creator as he is obligated with the duty of enforcing the laws of HIVE Academy to his fellow peers. I am built to serve!" Ugh.. as amazed as you are with meeting an actual living and functioning high-tech android, you'd way rather not spend any more time than you have to in this school!

"Guess what, Butl3r? Shrimp here's not in class and he doesnt have a hall pass!" Gizmo snitched on you to his robot.
"Oh dear," Butl3r frowned, still keeping that artificially polite tone of his, "that is a direct violation to Rule 742A of the HIVE Academy Code of Conduct, I'm afraid. According to our Headmaster, we have a zero-tolerance policy for tardiness." Uh oh. That doesnt sound good. "It is our job to abject the capital degree of punishment to any and all offenders." Capital degree of punishment?! That dont sound good either!

"W-w-what exactly is the 'capital degree of pu-WAAH!" you screamed the second Butl3r cut you off by pointing a long, shiny, extremely sharp sword right between your eyes! Worse even, the smile never left his face.
"I do hope you have not grown far too attached to your opposable thumbs." FINGER AMPUTATION?! He's gonna chop off your thumbs for being late to class?! THIS is legal punishment in this school?! You'd hate to imagine what they'd do to you if they found out youre not even enrolled to this school!

"Wait, Butl3r!" just then, Gizmo stopped him.
"What is it, Master Gizmo?" Butl3r put his sword away and awaited his beckon call.
Gizmo scratched his chin as he spoke, "...Maybe we're wrong. Maybe he DOES have a hall pass.... maybe THIS is his hall pass right here!" He pulled out a little slip from his pocket. "Hey... according to this, the reason he's late is cuz he just came back from the nurse's office. Something about pulling a big stick out of his butt!" Brat. But it's a hall pass all the same.
There's a catch. You know there is. "...What do you want?"

"It's simple, Shrimp!" Gizmo grinned, "you buy this little baby from us, and we can pretend all of this never happened and you can keep your precious thumbs! It's all yours for the low low price of just $40!"
FORTY BUCKS?! FOR A HALL PASS?! "F-FORTY BUCKS?! YOU GOTTA BE KIDDIN' ME!"
"Oh....Butl3r..."
Butl3r smiled and whipped his sword out again, "Awaiting your orders, Master Gizmo!"
You got no choice. It's steep, but youre in no position to bargain. Money is the least of your problems at this point. But the question is, do you have enough money?
You sigh defeatedly and checked your pockets...
14321122122212222122212222.title: The metallic arm of the law

"But nothing." Gizmo snaps and his robot raises the sword.

"At least let me finish what I wanna say first!" you yelp.

Gizmo has the robot stop and he leers at you.

"Well spit it out."

"White Reaper...he's been feeding information about this place to the Titans! He's hoping it'll lead to a blood bath!" you cry.

Gizmo's jaw drops like it weighs ametric ton.

1432112212221222212221222221.content:
You smiled and gave Gizmo the thumbs up as he ran off to provide the distraction...
"GOOD LUCK... ya moron," you muttered those last words. Man, who wouldve thought it was THAT easy to fool a supervillain? If you had known it was that easy, you'd have probably become a superhero yourself! ...Then again, maybe not. If you couldnt so much as take Jinx, you'd be better off picking the teeth of superheroes......

Still, you had a mental timer telling you when would be the right proper moment to get the bloody hell out of HIVE Academy for GOOD. As you waited, you continued shrinking.... but you still waited patiently. Waiting for what? A sign....

*KA-BOOOOOOOOMMM!!!!!* A HUGE EXPLOSION ONLY A WAYS AWAY! THAT musta been the 'distraction' Gizmo was talking about! Only seconds after hearing the explosion, a loud alarm went off following the constant flaring red lights! HIVE Academy is now on alert!
NOW is the time to make your move!

Loads of screaming students ran out of their classrooms running towards where the action is followed by the Academy guard trying to control the situation.
While everybody went one way, you went the other! You zipped passed loads of tall students with big boots that could easily crush your tiny body in one little stomp. You jumped and dodged, trying to avoid each foot, with the maximum amount of success!

"Just a.... little further!" you tell yourself, "Just a little... further!"

The gates were open! At last! You darted through those gates, finally relieved that youre gonna see the outside world again! Sure you dont have the foggiest which way is it to the Titan Tower, but who cares?! Youre out of the damn school for good! Hope Butl3r burned the sorry place to the ground! Goodbye HIVE Academy.... HELLO FREEDOM!!

"Free at last!! Free at laAAH YOU GOTTA BE FUCKING KIDDING ME!!!" ....Goodbye HIVE Academy... hello, miles and miles of ocean...

Yep, you shoulda known. The stupid Academy is in it's own private island! That would make sense.. it wouldnt be very smart to build a super secret all-supervillain school in the middle of a civilian city. It could be miles before you can reach civilization. And at your size, there's a great chance you'll be eaten by a fish LONG before you get there! Your big escape plan has gone to waste...
WAIT! Not yet! You see two glimmers of hope not too far away!

Well, actually two cruise ships docked by the bay. THEY can be your escape! However, you have no clue where either of them would go. There's not even a single clue where either of them would lead. It's not even a 50-50 tossup whether one of them might lead back to town. If youre really unlucky, NEITHER of them would!
Still, since you had an incredibly bad habit and taking huge risks, youre getting on one of those cruise ships! But which one? Which ship will you take and where will they go?

As you think, you hear a familiar voice through the intercom..
"*KRSH!* Ooooh death.... OOOOOOOOOOOOOOH DEAAATTHH.... WONT YA SPARE ME OVER 'TIL ANOTHER YEEEAAAAAAR?! *KRSH!*"

151121.content:
You raised your eyebrow as she floated back down to the ground and bent over towards you, still keeping that big cartoony grin on her face. You didnt like where this was going. You might even say you HATED where this was going.

"I shall keep you as the substitute to my Barbie's fiancee since Ken has met his unfortunate end in a freak lawnmower accident!" Starfire happily announced.
You squinted your eyes trying to decipher her fancy grasp of English... oh. She wants to keep you as a toy.

...A TOY?! "A T-T-TOY?!" you blurted out in shock. Sure it was better than being eaten, but you were a human being, damn it!

"Of course, minuscule creature," she replied, "that would best suit your tiny role of life, wouldnt it? I am your predator and you are my prey. But youre obviously not a gartilon... if anything, you taste somewhere between a slimy gazwash and the greenish chunks found inside Beast Boy's ears." Eww! "So if youre not for eating, youre for playing with!"
That makes sense. For an alien. But youre a human! A human in NEED! And she's a superhero!

You shook your head, "I... I dont think you understand. This isnt my normal size!" you explain to her, "Someone or something shrunk me. And I need help getting back to normal size."
But Starfire just tilted her head and her green eyes lit with curiosity, "I'm sorry little creature, but as your predator, I am not inclined to listen to your pleas. Please understand." A predator with rationality? "You are supposed to listen to MY orders since you are the prey and value life."
You raised your eyebrow from hearing that! That didnt sound like something a superhero would say! "A-Are you saying you'll kill me if I dont agree to be your toy?!"

Thankfully Starfire shook her head, "No! Of course not! However, if you dont obey my whim, I will be forced to subject you to the magshoffing."
'Magshoffing'?
"Magshoffing? What's that?"

"It is an ancient Tamaranian traditional method that has existed for centuries," Starfire explained, "long ago on my home planet, my kingdom was invaded and attacked by the Nimelelkian barbarians. Unfortunately for them, they were far far smaller than us... almost as small as you. The Tamaranian army easily conquered them. The punishment for invasion would be to execute our invaders, however my 14th ancestral grandmother, Queen Lottamira Kurunu Zophalish VII, decided to spare their lives... in exchange, the Nimelelkians would be subject to magshoffing for the rest of their lives. Most of their race did not last very long, many of which died due to too much magshoffing."

That does not answer your question. In fact, it makes you even more concerned over what 'magshoffing' is. Was it some sort of Tamaranian torture or... something else?
"But what exactly is magshoffing anyway?" you asked, "just what would happen to me? And would it hurt?"

Sadly, Starfire just gave you a nearly emotionless stare and answered, "as Queen Zophalish once said, if you have to ask, you probably cannot handle the magshoffing." You gulped hard. It seems your superheroine captor is still too accustomed to her alien traditions. Many of which may be bad for someone like you... someone who was nearly mistaken for a gartilon only moments ago.
And sadly, Starfire still saw you as her prey, so at this point your options are limited.

Speaking of which, she had a serious frown on her face as her alien green eyes sparkled eerily.
"So little creature... will you agree to become my Barbie's new suitor?" she questioned you, "...or will you perhaps be forced to magshoff like you've never magshoffed before?"
